title: GM CEO Met With UAW President to Jump-Start Stalled Labor Talks
text:
General Motors Co. Chief Executive Mary Barra met on Wednesday with United Auto Workers President Gary Jones to jump-start stalled contract talks and end a 25-day strike at the company’s U.S. factories, according to people briefed on the meeting.

Ms. Barra called the meeting with Mr. Jones and the UAW’s top bargainer for GM, Terry Dittes, concerned the union had yet to respond to the company’s latest proposal, which it shared with the union on Monday, the people said. The meeting was at GM’s Detroit headquarters, in the same...
